posts.post_content:
Looking to trade for T3s.  Need Christy Mathewson in SGC/PSA 1 or "A" with good eye appeal, but open to trade for other T3s in lower condition.

LMK what you have to offer.

r/
Frank

For those who have inquired, I haven't forgotten about you.  I am currently out of state and will respond to your trade offers once I return on Saturday.

Provided a back scan.  The reason for the "A" designation is because of regular pencil shading on the gold border.  I know this was done (not by me or previous owner to me) to try and improve the appearance, but other pencil markings that are noticeable are given a numerical grade.  Just sayin'

r/
Frank
